sense.def:
Immediate
pomeni tak, ki se zgodi brez odloga.

seg.quote: They called for an immediate meeting of the Security Council.

sense.def:
Kadar so potrebe ali zadeve
immediate
, jih je treba hitro zadovoljiti ali urediti.

seg.quote: He was occupied with more immediate matters.

sense.def:
Immediate
pomeni tudi naslednji v času ali položaju.

seg.quote: Charlie was more honest than his immediate predecessor.
To the immediate south we can see the mountains.

sense.def:
Sorodniki, ki so
immediate
, so nekomu najbližji, na primer starši, bratje in sestre.
